cells.data:
1. sync BCL-developer-docs in github
  2. open brightcove-player/index.html
  3. update release/prerelease version numbers (links)
  4. open brightcove-player/release-info/pre-release.html
    1. update curl with latest prerelease number
    2. If no prerelease
      1. uncomment no prerelease block
      2. comment out any old prerelease info
    3. If new prerelease with other prereleases which haven’t been rolled into current release
      1. list all older prereleases (uncomment older if needed)
      2. update current prerelease number and features
    4. If new prerelease with no older versions
      1. only uncommented section is current prerelease
  5. open brightcove-player/release-info/current-release.html
    1. move current release into previous release section 
    2. put in new info for current release
  6. sync to Perform
  7. sync on github
  8. deploy
